itunes:summary:
Tim Kennedy joins the show to talk about his new book Scars and Stripes, what he thought of the police response to the school shooting in Uvalde, how he prepares his school in Austin to deal with school shooters, his involvement with Ukraine and what he thinks will be the end result of Russia's invasion, and how he got kicked out of both a police department and a fire department.

description:
Tim Kennedy joins the show to talk about his new book Scars and Stripes, what he thought of the police response to the school shooting in Uvalde, how he prepares his school in Austin to deal with school shooters, his involvement with Ukraine and what he thinks will be the end result of Russia's invasion, and how he got kicked out of both a police department and a fire department.
